name: Armed Air Forces - Jet Fighter
description:
Armed Air Forces offers all-embracing combat flight simulation experience on mobile devices. Finally you can play PC quality combat game anywhere and anytime you wish.
Armed Air Forces contains many details that have not been in a mobile game before!

Explore huge scenery with detailed cities and infrastructure in modern jet fighter aircraft or ww2 legendary fighter.
Start a quick Dogfight to test your air combat skill or generate some ground targets to make a quick bombing mission. Or just take-off and enjoy free flight.

Become a military pilot and take an advantage of the unique opportunity to control modern fighter like F-16C, A-10C, F-35 Lightning II, Mirage 2000C, AV-8B Harrier II, Super Tucano or legendary BF-109 Messerchmitt.

FEATURES:
• Simple mission generator for quick fight (enemy aircrafts, vehicles, buildings)
• Dogfight mode
• Record your flight mode (you can record your flight and use it later as AI plane for formation flights)
• Every aircraft features detailed 3D cockpit with working instruments, HUD or mfd displays.
• Every aircraft carries real armament.
• Every aircraft has it's own physics, aerofoil and limits.
• Choose time of the day.
• VTOL flight modes for F-35 Lightning II and AV-8B Harrier II
• High-end graphics targeted for newest devices (also optimized for older devices)
• HOT or COLD start (from taxi)

• continued development bringing updates with new content
